title: A Night to Celebrate and Support - Newtown Kindness Fundraiser
desc: On December 5, 2000 U2 performed a historical concert at Irving Plaza. CELEBRATE the anniversary of that night and SUPPORT Newtown Kindness at the same time. Featuring Entertainment By: ?Unforgettable Fire (U2 Tribute Band), The Racer and more. ?Hosted ?by Comedian Seaton Smith. Newtown Kindness is an organization formed in honor of Charlotte Helen Bacon who lost her life in the Sandy Hook Elementary School Tragedy.
